title: As A Management Consultant, I Decided To Make A Business Plan With The Goddess In Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Business Management   Businessmen   Fantasy World   Gods   Male Protagonist
author: 鵜久森ざっぱ
description:
A consultant is like a military strategist in a company.

This is a story about a man who was employed by a major consulting firm and was supposed to be on an elite course to win in life, but he teams up with a fallen loser goddess in another world and aims to turn things around.>
